extendedInfo.description: Guns is a realistic simulator with shooting range experience, which has most popular guns/weapons and their information, including Handguns, Shotguns, Sub-Machine Guns, Assault Rifles, Sniper Rifles, Machine Guns, Grenades, Knives.Tap the screen or shake to fire, tap menu for settings.Camera permission is only for camera preview in target mode, won't actually take pictures.===Handguns===-Desert Eagle .50 AE-Taurus Model 66 .357 Magnum-H&K USP .45 Tactical-Glock18 Select Fire-SIG P228-Beretta 96 Brigadier-Beretta 96 Brigadier Inox-FN Five-Seven-Taurus Model 44 .44 Magnum-Colt M1911 A1-Taurus Raging Bull-Jericho 941-Mauser C96-Walther P99-Ruger SR9-MP-443 Grach-H&K MK23===Shotguns===-Benelli M3 Super90-W1200-Franchi SPAS-12-AA-12-Browning Takedown .22 LR===Sub-Machine Guns===-H&K Mp5 Navy-Steyr Tactical Machine Pistol-FN P90-Ingram MAC-10-MP 40-H&K UMP45-Thompson M1A1-H&K MP7A1-PPSh-41-B&T MP9===Assault Rifles===-AK-47-H&K G36C-Gewehr 43-Famas F1-M16-FN FS2000 Civilian Model-Sig SG-552 Commando-Colt M4A1 Carbine-Steyr Aug-Heckler & Koch HK416-Tar 21-L85A1-AR15 A3-AK-74-XM8-StG 44-Micro Galil-K2-FN Scar Heavy-M14===Sniper Rifles===-Barrett M82-AI Arctic Warfare/Magnum-Steyr Scout-R700-H&K G3/SG-1 Sniper Rifle-Sig SG-550 Sniper-CheyTac M200 Intervention-Dragnov Sniper Rifle-M21 Sniper Rifle===Machine Guns===-M134 Gatling Gun-FN M249 Para-MG42-M60-Browning M1919===Rocket Launchers===-RPG 7-RPG 29-AT 4===Other Weapons===  (More --> Other Weapons)-MK2 Grenade-Combat U.S.M.C Knife-Ballistic Knife-M24 Grenade-BT Delta Elite Paintball Gun

reviews.comment: Excellence, thanks for the latest update. Now add with paintball gun, love it !!!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love the great selection of guns including the new paintball gun. But there are a few things which would make this even better. E.G. If you could change between burst fire/full automatic with certain guns and maybe being able to pump the shotguns.

reviews.title: Lets off steam from work...
reviews.comment: After work, I\'m usually too tured to deal with the stuffs going on at home, so I get the app out and \"shoot\" everything. It really works well.

reviews.title: Cool n awesome

reviews.author: Sam Eagle

reviews.title: Great game with lots of options.
reviews.comment: This game is great.  Pick your weapon and press the gun to fire it. Slide your finger along the bullets to reload.  Greatest feature is the use of your camera to shoot friends or annoyances using your camera as the sighting device.
